mapper.select: SELECT bu.businessname, bu.businessstart, bu.businessend, bu.businessno, bu.businesswith, bu.businesslocationmain FROM employee emp , business bu WHERE emp.empid = bu.empid AND emp.empid = #{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET companyno = #{companyno}, empname = #{empname}, emppassword = #{emppassword}, empdept = #{empdept}, empphone = #{empphone} WHERE empid = #{empid}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM employee WHERE companyno = #{companyno} AND empname like '%' ||#{empname}|| '%'
SELECT * FROM business WHERE businesswith = #{value} AND businessrepresent = 'true'
SELECT TO_CHAR(scheduleday,'YYYY-MM-DD') scheduleday FROM schedule WHERE businessno = #{value} GROUP BY scheduleday ORDER BY scheduleday

SELECT re.recipeday recipeday, re.recipeplace recipeplace, re.recipepay recipepay, re.recipememo recipememo, it.itemcategory itemcategory, it.itemcount itemcount, it.itemprice itemprice, it.itemname itemname FROM recipe re,schedule sc, item it WHERE re.scheduleno = sc.scheduleno AND it.recipeno = re.recipeno AND sc.businessno = #{businessNumber} AND sc.scheduleday = #{date}

SELECT re.recipeday recipeday, re.recipeplace recipeplace, re.recipepay recipepay, re.recipememo recipememo, it.itemcategory itemcategory, it.itemcount itemcount, it.itemprice itemprice, it.itemname itemname FROM recipe re,schedule sc, item it WHERE re.scheduleno = sc.scheduleno AND it.recipeno = re.recipeno AND sc.businessno = #{businessNumber} ORDER BY re.recipeday

SELECT TO_CHAR(re.recipeday,'YYYY-MM-DD') recipeday, it.itemcategory itemcategory, sum(it.itemcount*it.itemprice) finalprice FROM recipe re,schedule sc, item it WHERE re.scheduleno = sc.scheduleno AND it.recipeno = re.recipeno AND sc.businessno = #{value} GROUP BY re.recipeday, it.itemcategory ORDER BY re.recipeday

SELECT re.recipeday recipeday, re.recipeplace recipeplace, re.recipepay recipepay, re.recipememo recipememo, it.itemcategory itemcategory, it.itemcount itemcount, it.itemprice itemprice, it.itemname itemname FROM company co, employee em, business bu, schedule sc, recipe re, item it WHERE co.companyno = em.companyno AND em.empid = bu.empid AND bu.businessno = sc.businessno AND sc.scheduleno = re.scheduleno AND re.recipeno = it.recipeno AND co.companyno = #{value} ORDER BY re.recipeday

SELECT re.recipeday recipeday, re.recipeplace recipeplace, re.recipepay recipepay, re.recipememo recipememo, it.itemcategory itemcategory, it.itemcount itemcount, it.itemprice itemprice, it.itemname itemname FROM company co, employee em, business bu, schedule sc, recipe re, item it WHERE co.companyno = em.companyno AND em.empid = bu.empid AND bu.businessno = sc.businessno AND sc.scheduleno = re.scheduleno AND re.recipeno = it.recipeno AND co.companyno = #{companyNo} AND bu.businesslocationmain = #{location} ORDER BY re.recipeday
SELECT DISTINCT bu.businesslocationmain FROM company co, employee em, business bu WHERE co.companyno = em.companyno AND em.empid = bu.empid AND co.companyno = #{value}

SELECT ROUND(a.totalprice/b.totalprice,3) proportion, a.businesslocationmain from ( SELECT SUM(it.itemcount * it.itemprice) totalprice, bu.businesslocationmain businesslocationmain FROM company co, employee em, business bu, schedule sc, recipe re, item it WHERE co.companyno = em.companyno AND em.empid = bu.empid AND bu.businessno = sc.businessno AND sc.scheduleno = re.scheduleno AND re.recipeno = it.recipeno AND co.companyno = #{companyNo} GROUP BY bu.businesslocationmain ) b, ( SELECT SUM(it.itemcount * it.itemprice) totalprice, bu.businesslocationmain FROM company co, employee em, business bu, schedule sc, recipe re, item it WHERE co.companyno = em.companyno AND em.empid = bu.empid AND bu.businessno = sc.businessno AND sc.scheduleno = re.scheduleno AND re.recipeno = it.recipeno AND co.companyno = #{companyNo} AND it.itemcategory = #{category} GROUP BY bu.businesslocationmain ) a WHERE a.businesslocationmain = b.businesslocationmain
